name: Vampiric Knight
description: The Vampiric Knight is a powerful undead warrior clad in impressive armor, combining martial prowess and dark magical abilities.
memorable: It regenerates health rapidly unless damaged by radiant sources, showcasing classic vampire traits and abilities.
goals: To dominate and protect its undead allies while wreaking havoc on living foes.
relations: Belongs to a hierarchy of undead, often seen alongside other vampires.
environment: Typically found in dark, abandoned places, or serving in ancient castles.
strengths: High strength and constitution scores, coupled with exceptional regeneration and melee capabilities.
weaknesses: Susceptible to radiant damage, running water, and wooden stakes.
attacks: Utilizes a multiattack with an impaling longsword, inflicting both slashing and necrotic damage.
most_powerful_ability: Channel Corruption, an area attack that deals heavy necrotic damage to multiple enemies.
skills: Excels in athletics and perception, allowing it to perform physical feats and notice hidden threats effectively.
additional_information: Regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn if not in running water.
Takes acid damage when ending its turn in running water.
Paralyzed by a wooden stake driven into its heart when incapacitated.
Can shield allies, boosting their defense.

creature with weaknesses to radiant damage
